trends: There have been no other sightings in Brighton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsmyself and my girlfriend lay on the ground to see if we could spot a shooting star to make a wish (silly but we live in london and you do not get to see a clear sky in london). when i was looking into the clear night sky i saw 3 objects going across the sky changing thier speed dramatically in line across the sky, you could tell it was around the edge of the sky into space it took about 3 seconds (plenty of time for me to see clear they were moving in ways onlys exceleration could possible make objects move in this way )to cross the sky, the main issue, i have is they were definately a craft, i just do not think man kind has developed an aircraft to hit these speeds Please can you inform me if an craft man kind has desinged could go clear across the night sky directly above in 3 seconds at extreme hights? i felt i need to find out if a aircraft could possible do this in space that man has made they just carried on and went off towards space i could not see it anymore
Summary: 3 starlight objects going a a straight line changing thier speed individually keeping in line, arcoss the whole sky in about 4 seconds
